name: Detective Undetected
description:
For the 1st Stuy Game Devs Game Jam (RIP, this was the only submission)

Story/Synopsis: In this world, everyone has special abilities. You’re a private investigator hired by a corporation to gather information from a rival company using your powers of invisibility.

Chosen Theme(s): Urban-fantasy

Required Mechanic: "Combat"

Sound effects sampled from freesound.org: https://pastebin.com/A5Q32HKv

Music: nightWalk by airtone (c) copyright 2017 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/airtone/56520 

Programming: Cabidge (Me)

Art: VH

Font: Lilian https://www.dafont.com/lilian-2.font
